# API Reference for cdktf.AppOptions

   AppOptions <a name="AppOptions" id="cdktf.AppOptions"></a>
  
  # Initializer <a name="Initializer" id="cdktf.AppOptions.Initializer"></a>
  
  ```csharp
  using HashiCorp.Cdktf;
  
  new AppOptions {
      System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary< string, object > Context = null,
      string Outdir = null,
      bool SkipValidation = null,
      bool StackTraces = null
  };
  ```
  
  # Properties <a name="Properties" id="Properties"></a>
  
  | **Name** | **Type** | **Description** |
  | --- | --- | --- |
  | <code><a href="#cdktf.AppOptions.property.context">Context</a></code> | <code>System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary< string, object ></code> | Additional context values for the application. |
  | <code><a href="#cdktf.AppOptions.property.outdir">Outdir</a></code> | <code>string</code> | The directory to output Terraform resources. |
  | <code><a href="#cdktf.AppOptions.property.skipValidation">SkipValidation</a></code> | <code>bool</code> | Whether to skip the validation during synthesis of the app. |
  | <code><a href="#cdktf.AppOptions.property.stackTraces">StackTraces</a></code> | <code>bool</code> | *No description.* |
  
  ---
  
  ## `Context`<sup>Optional</sup> <a name="Context" id="cdktf.AppOptions.property.context"></a>
  
  ```csharp
  public System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary< string, object > Context { get; set; }
  ```
  
  - *Type:* System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary< string, object >
  - *Default:* no additional context
  
  Additional context values for the application.
  
  Context set by the CLI or the `context` key in `cdktf.json` has precedence.
  
  Context can be read from any construct using `node.getContext(key)`.
  
  ---
  
  ## `Outdir`<sup>Optional</sup> <a name="Outdir" id="cdktf.AppOptions.property.outdir"></a>
  
  ```csharp
  public string Outdir { get; set; }
  ```
  
  - *Type:* string
  - *Default:* CDKTF_OUTDIR if defined, otherwise "cdktf.out"
  
  The directory to output Terraform resources.
  
  ---
  
  ## `SkipValidation`<sup>Optional</sup> <a name="SkipValidation" id="cdktf.AppOptions.property.skipValidation"></a>
  
  ```csharp
  public bool SkipValidation { get; set; }
  ```
  
  - *Type:* bool
  - *Default:* false
  
  Whether to skip the validation during synthesis of the app.
  
  ---
  
  ## `StackTraces`<sup>Optional</sup> <a name="StackTraces" id="cdktf.AppOptions.property.stackTraces"></a>
  
  ```csharp
  public bool StackTraces { get; set; }
  ```
  
  - *Type:* bool
  
  ---
